title: Nordstrom to give $25,000 for l.a. earthquake relief
author: Seattle Times Staffseattle Times News Services
text: SEATTLE - Nordstrom will donate $25,000 to the United Way Earthquake Relief Fund for relief efforts stemming from the recent Los Angeles area earthquake.    Nordstrom has five stores in Los Angeles. All are operating except the Topanga Plaza store, which is expected to reopen later this month.
